answers.answer: I went to the er middle of this past week for the same reason.. I was told the dizzyness was from all the extra blood pumping through my body.. Maybe that could be the issue wirh your dizzy spells
Stay hydrated, and eat more frequently.  This happens to me and its because I have naturally low blood pressure.

I had a few episodes like this, but I was also diagnosed with vertigo a few years back. I would suggest calling the doctor and letting them know they may want to see u, just to make sure it wasn't anything to be concerned about.
Thanks for all the advice.i will speak to my doc tomorrow.hopefully its only a temporary thing.
Could be, but id also be wondering if its your blood pressure sitting a bit low? I get it all the time - but I have very low iron levels and low blood pressure.I hope you find out what it is soon :)

question: Im 32wks +4 days and starting to get light headed a few mins after i eat dinner or snacks.it only lasts a few mins but i feel totally spaced out and my eyes feel funny. Its starting to become more frequent now. I did have to get tested for the gestational diabetes the other day so i will be getting the results of that on tuesday. My baby is well above average size and ive alot of fluid around her. So i more than likely have the diabetes, but could all this be related??? My iron levels seem to be fine.
title: dizzy and spaced out at 32wks
